attributes.action: Scrap the taxcredits compliance checks stop the bullying
attributes.additional_details: The compliance was taken to court for their bullying behaviour, they are still keeping money from single mums of one child away and making innocents more and more in debt
attributes.background: The compliance checks are illogic and make people feel they are criminals! The innocent suffer and have money stopped even if they send the evidence.This is bullying and we the public call for this to be scrapped
